title: Apollo 13 (1995) Tom Hanks + Kevin Bacon (Optional MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112384/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112384/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc.): Danish, Dutch, English for the hearing impaired, Finnish, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Norwegian, Swedish.

I just discovered that this classic double Oscar-winner, was not available here in a 700 MiB quality rip with multisubs, so I made one for you.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
